suggestedTasks.title: Implement Coordinated Component Exit Animation
suggestedTasks.description:
Develop a unified exit animation strategy for ActiveTasks rows and associated components. This requires modifying the animation logic to ensure SessionCard and TaskDetailPaneA transition simultaneously with the row deletion. Focus on creating a consistent, smooth exit transition that prevents visual artifacts or abrupt disappearances.

Key areas to address:
- Shared animation state management
- Synchronization of component exit triggers
- Consistent animation timing and easing
